summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 1.9°C) and outside temperature (up 1.5°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 3.1 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 9623 lux) and cloud levels (up 326 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 15028 lux), cloud levels (up 1906 m), feels like temperature (up 1.6°C), and outside temperature (up 2.1°C) when compared to today.

Today’s average cloud levels is 326.3m lower than yesterday, 829.9m lower than the past week, 1905.7m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 713m and a high of 1594m, averaging 740.6m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; mild and pleasant. Also, you’ll experience intense stickiness in the air and calm and still conditions are expected. Light to moderate rain is forecast, partial cloudiness with some periods of sun, and it’s dim outside. The weather may change rapidly and become worse.
